talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: There's appealing information for you guys.

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: You don't have to listen to me.

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: But, I think the king will praise you.

talkDataSet.name: Evilmage
talkDataSet.dialogue: for doing what I told you to.
